title: AI-Driven Assessment, Diagnostics for Joint Function and Muscle Health
description: Delivers insight into joint function, muscle health, and recovery needs using EMG and ROM - ideal for post-op, chronic pain and neuro and orthopedic rehabilitation settings.

title: AI-Driven Smart Energy Management
description: The use case leverages AI to optimize energy distribution, improve grid efficiency, detect fraud, and integrate renewables for a smarter power sector.

title: AI Enabled Power Sector Regulatory Assistant
description: To develop an AI-powered Regulatory Assistant that helps Discoms and Regulators prepare, analyse, and interpret tariff petitions and regulatory orders.

title: AI-Powered Conversational Agents for Rural E-Governance
description: This use case enables rural citizens to access government services via AI voice assistants that understand dialects, resolve queries, and assist with applications seamlessly.

title: AI-Powered Urban Growth Planning
description: This use case is about leveraging AI to track urban expansion, detect slums, and support data-driven smart city planning for sustainable urban development.

title: AI-Powered Voice Assistant for Farmers
description: This use case focuses on voice assistant using Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) to help farmers access agricultural insights (regional languages, pest control, weather, etc.).

title: A Multilingual Gateway to India's Parliamentary Proceedings
description: Sansad.in is an initiative offering real-time, AI-powered multilingual transcription and translation of Indian parliamentary proceedings, making legislative content accessible.

title: AI-Powered Fair Price Shop Optimization and Fraud Detection
description: This use case leverages AI to optimize ration distribution, detect fraudulent transactions, and enhance Fair Price Shop efficiency.

title: AI-Powered Smart Rural Development Planning
description: This use case leverages AI to identify rural infrastructure gaps, optimize resource allocation for sustainable development.

title: Intelligent Traffic Management System
description: AI-powered system for real-time traffic flow optimization, accident detection, and automated signal control in urban areas.

title: Automated Tax Filing Assistant
description: AI-based chatbot that helps citizens understand tax regulations and file their returns accurately using natural language processing.

title: Predictive Maintenance for Railway Infrastructure
description: Machine learning model for predicting maintenance needs of railway tracks, bridges, and rolling stock to prevent failures.

title: Smart Waste Management System
description: IoT and AI-based solution for optimizing waste collection routes and monitoring bin fill levels in real-time.

title: AI-Driven Telemedicine Platform
description: Remote healthcare platform using AI for preliminary diagnosis, symptom checking, and doctor-patient matching.

title: Flood Prediction and Early Warning System
description: Machine learning model for predicting floods using weather data, river levels, and historical patterns to enable timely evacuations.

title: Automated Legal Document Analysis
description: NLP-based system for analyzing legal documents, extracting key clauses, and identifying potential issues.

title: Personalized Learning Platform
description: AI-powered adaptive learning system that customizes educational content based on student performance and learning style.

title: Livestock Health Monitoring System
description: IoT and computer vision-based system for monitoring livestock health, detecting diseases early, and optimizing veterinary care.

title: Air Quality Prediction and Advisory
description: Machine learning model for predicting air quality indices and providing health advisories to citizens.

title: Digital Identity Verification System
description: AI-based biometric verification system for secure and instant identity verification using face and fingerprint recognition.

title: Smart Grid Energy Distribution
description: AI-optimized power distribution system that balances load, reduces transmission losses, and integrates renewable energy sources.

title: Tourism Recommendation Engine
description: Personalized tourism recommendation system using user preferences, weather data, and seasonal trends.

title: Employment Matching Platform
description: AI-powered job matching system that connects job seekers with suitable opportunities based on skills, experience, and preferences.

title: Building Safety Assessment System
description: Computer vision-based system for assessing structural integrity of buildings and identifying potential safety hazards.

title: Financial Literacy Chatbot
description: Multilingual AI chatbot that provides financial education, answers queries about banking, and helps with basic financial planning.
